original_text: Some worthless scoundrels gathered around him and opposed Rehoboam son of Solomon when he was young and indecisive and not strong enough to resist them.
korean_text: 난봉꾼과 잡배가 모여 따르므로 스스로 강하게 되어 솔로몬의 아들 르호보암을 대적하였으나 그 때에 르호보암이 어리고 마음이 연약하여 그들의 입을 능히 막지 못하였었느니라

sentences.original_text: Some worthless scoundrels gathered around him
and opposed Rehoboam son of Solomon
when he was young and indecisive
and not strong enough to resist them
sentences.korean_translation: 그들을 대항할 만큼 강하지 못했을 때였다
